T02TD1432E:222b-1: shr'i tsakra sam ba ra s'a dha nam /
T02TD1432E:222b-3: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02TD1432E:222b-4: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1432E:222b-5: 'gro kun don la rab gzhol ba'i //
T02TD1432E:222b-6: rang rgyud sngags dang rnal 'byor shes //
T02TD1432E:222b-7: phyi rol rnam rtog spangs nas ni //
T02TD1432E:222b-8: dam tshig mnyam nyid rnal 'byor che /
T02TD1432E:222b-9: nang par sad pa dang mal nas langs te /
T02TD1432E:222b-10: rnal 'byor dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su /
T02TD1432E:222b-12: bdud rtsi'i ril bu khar bcug la shr'i he ru ka zhes bya ba'i don dran par byas te /
T02TD1432E:222b-13: snying gar zla ba la dpal mchog dang po'i yi ge ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin can 'od zer dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1432E:222b-14: des sgo gsum gyi dri ma'ang sbyang ngo //
T02TD1432E:223a-1: bskul nas phyag btsal rang lus gzhug / rkang pa sum mdor lte snying ga //
T02TD1432E:223a-2: rlung dang me chu sa yin no //
T02TD1432E:223a-3: sgal tshigs ri rgyal de bzhin te //
T02TD1432E:223a-4: lus ni mnyam pa sgo bzhi rlung //
T02TD1432E:223a-5: rgyan rnams rab mdzes he ru ka'i //
T02TD1432E:223a-7: aindra n'i la mtshungs pa'i mdog / zhal bzhi re re spyan gsum pa //
T02TD1432E:223a-8: rtsa ba'i lus mdog ljang dang dmar //
T02TD1432E:223a-9: gser gyi 'od ltar gtsigs pa po //
T02TD1432E:223a-10: ral pa'i thor tshugs zla bas brgyan //
T02TD1432E:223a-11: thod phreng sna tshogs rdo rje bcas //
T02TD1432E:223a-12: rdo rje dril bus yang dag 'khyud //
T02TD1432E:223a-13: gnyis kyis glang po'i pags pa bsnams //
T02TD1432E:223a-14: g-yas kyi lag na da ma ru //
T02TD1432E:223a-15: dgra sta gri gug rtse gsum pa //
T02TD1432E:223a-16: g-yon na kha tv'am ga thod pa //
T02TD1432E:223a-17: zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo bsnams //
T02TD1432E:223a-18: g-yas brkyang pa yi gar gyis ni //
T02TD1432E:223a-19: 'jigs byed dus mtshan mnyam par mnan //
T02TD1432E:223a-20: stag lpags bsnams dkris mgo phreng can //
T02TD1432E:223a-21: nyams dgu rgyan drug gis btab pa'o //
T02TD1432E:223a-22: bam las 'khyud pa'i bcom ldan yum //
T02TD1432E:223a-23: zhal gcig spyan gsum dmar 'bar ba //
T02TD1432E:223a-24: skra grol dum bu'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD1432E:223a-25: byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khyud //
T02TD1432E:223a-26: g-yon pas 'khyud cing thod pa dag / gdug pa bdud kyi khrag gis gang //
T02TD1432E:223a-27: g-yas pa rtag tu sdigs mdzub dang //
T02TD1432E:223a-28: ma rungs pa yi gri gug bsnams //
T02TD1432E:223a-29: bde chen thugs rje'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD1432E:223a-30: kha sbyor phyi nyid legs shes pas //
T02TD1432E:223a-31: thugs su aa wa dh'u t'i h'um //
T02TD1432E:223a-32: ma bcos nang gi bdag nyid do //
T02TD1432E:223a-33: mkha' 'gro l'a ma dum skyes ma //
T02TD1432E:223a-34: gzugs can ma ste bzhi rnams kyang //
T02TD1432E:223a-35: zhal mdog dang mtshungs kha tv'am snod //
T02TD1432E:223a-36: gri dang phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan //
T02TD1432E:223a-37: mchod pa bzhi yi rang bzhin rtsa //
T02TD1432E:223a-38: phyogs bral bde chen 'khor lo ste //
T02TD1432E:223a-39: mam lam pam tam h'um brgyad kyang //
T02TD1432E:223a-40: dam tshig cig car bshad pa yin //
T02TD1432E:223a-56: ma ku 'di dag gnas su rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1432E:223a-57: rtsa yin dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi //
T02TD1432E:223a-58: lus kyi khams su brtag par bya //
T02TD1432E:223a-59: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
T02TD1432E:223b-0: spyi bor khanda ka p'a li dang rab @223b tu gtum mo //
T02TD1432E:223b-1: spyi gtsug tu ma h'a kam ka la dang gtum pa'i mig can ma'o //
T02TD1432E:223b-2: rna ba g-yas par kang ka la dang /
T02TD1432E:223b-4: ltag par mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang /
T02TD1432E:223b-5: sna chen ma ste gnas so //
T02TD1432E:223b-6: rna ba g-yon par su ra bee ri dang /
T02TD1432E:223b-8: smin ma'i mtshams su aa mi t'a bh'a dang mi thur ma'o //
T02TD1432E:223b-9: mig tu rdo rje'i 'od dang langka'i dbang phyug ma'o //
T02TD1432E:223b-10: phrag par rdo rje'i sku dang /
T02TD1432E:223b-11: shing grib ni nye ba'i gnas te /
T02TD1432E:223b-12: thugs kyi 'khor lo nam mkha' la spyod pa mdog sngon po'o //
T02TD1432E:223b-13: mchan khung du myu gu can dang sa srungs ma'o //
T02TD1432E:223b-14: nu mar rdo rje ral pa can dang /
T02TD1432E:223b-15: 'jigs byed chen mo ste zhing ngo //
T02TD1432E:223b-16: lte bar dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gi shugs can ma'o //
T02TD1432E:223b-17: sna rtser badzra h'um ka ra dang /
T02TD1432E:223b-18: chang 'thung ma ste nye ba'i zhing ngo //
T02TD1432E:223b-19: khar rab tu bzang po dang shy'a ma de bi'o //
T02TD1432E:223b-20: mgrin par rdo rje bzang po dang /
T02TD1432E:223b-21: shin tu bzang mo ste tshando ha'o ;
T02TD1432E:223b-22: / snying gar 'jigs byed chen po dang rta rna ma'o /
T02TD1432E:223b-23: mdoms par mig mi bzang dang /
T02TD1432E:223b-24: bya gdong ma ste nye ba'i tshando ha ste gsung gi 'khor lo sa la spyod pa mdog dmar po'o //
T02TD1432E:223b-25: mtshan ma la stobs po che dang /
T02TD1432E:223b-27: bshang lam du rin chen rdo rje dang khanda ro hi ste 'dus pa can na //
T02TD1432E:223b-30: byin par nam mkha'i snying po dang tsakra war mi ni ste nye ba'i 'dus pa can no //
T02TD1432E:223b-31: sor mo rnams la shr'i he ru ka dang shin tu dpa' mo'o //
T02TD1432E:223b-32: bol gong du padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen ma ste dur khrod do //
T02TD1432E:223b-33: mthe bong la rnam par snang byed dang tsakra warti ni'o //
T02TD1432E:223b-34: pus mo gnyis la rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD1432E:223b-35: brtson 'grus chen mo ni nye ba'i dur khrod do //
T02TD1432E:223b-36: sku yi 'khor lo sa 'og na spyod pa ste mdog dkar po'o //
T02TD1432E:223b-37: khanda ka p'a la la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin te /
T02TD1432E:223b-38: 'on kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1432E:223b-39: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams ni rdo rje phag mo'i rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin te /
T02TD1432E:223b-40: sa bcu yongs su dag pa rnams so //
T02TD1432E:223b-42: khyi dang phag gi gdong pa can rnams dang /
T02TD1432E:223b-45: mche ba can dang 'joms ma ste /
T02TD1432E:224a-1: phyogs dang mtshams su mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin te /
T02TD1432E:224a-2: mtshams kyi lha mo rnams ni 'on kyang gzugs gnyis ma'o //
T02TD1432E:224a-3: byang chub phyogs kyi rang bzhin can //
T02TD1432E:224a-4: me long gzugs brnyan bzhin gsol blta //
T02TD1432E:224a-5: de nas go cha gnyis shes nas //
T02TD1432E:224a-6: ye shes 'khor lo rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1432E:224a-7: snying ga mgo bo spyi gtsug dang //
T02TD1432E:224a-8: phrag pa mig dang yan lag la //
T02TD1432E:224a-9: rdor sems snang mdzad gar dbang phyug / khrag 'thung nyi ma rta mchog bsam //
T02TD1432E:224a-10: lte ba snying ga kha spyi bo //
T02TD1432E:224a-11: spyi gtsug yan lag thams cad la //
T02TD1432E:224a-12: phag mo gshin rje rmongs byed ma //
T02TD1432E:224a-13: sbyin byed skrag byed gtum ma'o //
T02TD1432E:224a-14: aom ha na ma hi: sv'a h'a hu boo sha ta he h'um h'um ho phat ho phat ham /
T02TD1432E:224a-15: aom bam ham yom him mom hrem hrim h'um h'um phat phat /
T02TD1432E:224a-16: sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1432E:224a-17: spyan drangs mchod nas rang lus gzhug / de bzhin rgyun ni dbang bskur nas //
T02TD1432E:224a-18: cod pan dang ni lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD1432E:224a-19: dza: h'um bam ho: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02TD1432E:224a-20: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam hum h'um phat phat d'a ki ni dz'a la sam ba ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD1432E:224a-21: aom hri: ha ha hum h'um phat /
T02TD1432E:224a-22: snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02TD1432E:224a-23: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'a ye hum h'um phat /
T02TD1432E:224a-24: aom sarba buddh'a d'a ki n'i ye badzra warnna n'i ye hum h'um phat /
T02TD1432E:224a-25: bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po dang /
T02TD1432E:224a-27: / rab tu 'bad nas mchod nas ni //
T02TD1432E:224a-28: dud chen phreng ba blang bya ste //
T02TD1432E:224a-29: ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa //
T02TD1432E:224a-30: de srid du ni rab tu bzlas //
T02TD1432E:224a-31: bsam gtan mi nus rnal 'byor bas //
T02TD1432E:224a-32: go cha che la sogs bsrungs te //
T02TD1432E:224a-33: rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas //
T02TD1432E:224a-34: sems can kun las rab brtag bya //
T02TD1432E:224a-35: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags bzlas shing //
T02TD1432E:224a-36: tshangs par spyod pa rtag tu bsam //
T02TD1432E:224a-37: zas kyi rdo rje sems sogs dang //
T02TD1432E:224a-38: snying ga'i dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1432E:224a-39: zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs bas //
T02TD1432E:224a-40: rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1432E:224a-41: dam tshig legs sogs legs gnas pas //
T02TD1432E:224a-42: mtshan phyed gyur nas gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD1432E:224a-43: aom aa ralli ho: dza: h'um bam ho: badzra d'a ki n'i sa ma ya stvam dri shya ho: aom a'a: h'um kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi sarba yaksha raksha sa bh'u ta pre ta pi sh'a tsa aun ma da aa pa sm'a ra /
T02TD1432E:224a-44: badzra d'a ka d'a ki n+y'a da ya /
T02TD1432E:224a-45: ai mam ba lim grihnam tu sa ma ya rakshantu ma ma sarbba siddhimme pra ya tstsha ntu /
T02TD1432E:224b-0: @224b ya the bam ya thashtam bhunydza th'a /
T02TD1432E:224b-1: dzi gha th'a pi pa th'a m'a ti kra ma th'a ma ma sarba karta ya sa ta su kham bi brid dha ye sa ha yi ka bha bantu hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1432E:224b-2: rtag tu snying la gnas pa yi //
T02TD1432E:224b-3: thig le gcig la 'gyur med de //
T02TD1432E:224b-4: de sgom byed pa'i skye bo la //
T02TD1432E:224b-5: nges par ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1432E:224b-6: kha tv'am ga ni lha yi sku //
T02TD1432E:224b-7: shes rab d'a ma ru yi sgra //
T02TD1432E:224b-8: nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02TD1432E:224b-9: rnal 'byor ma ni mtshan mo bshad //
T02TD1432E:224b-10: gnyis med ye shes sems ldan la //
T02TD1432E:224b-11: mi bya ba ni ci yang med //
T02TD1432E:224b-12: 'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te //
T02TD1432E:224b-13: dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du spyod //
T02TD1432E:224b-14: mya ngan 'das byung dpa' bo rnams //
T02TD1432E:224b-15: sdug pa yid kyi sprul pa ste //
T02TD1432E:224b-16: dag pa chos kyi sprul pa ni //
T02TD1432E:224b-17: phag mo'i gzugs su bstan pa yin //
T02TD1432E:224b-18: sems la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1432E:224b-19: mya ngan 'das pa mi ston to //
T02TD1432E:224b-21: mkha' spyod pa yi gnas su khrid //
T02TD1432E:224b-22: de lta'i dpa' bo chen po dang //
T02TD1432E:224b-24: cho ga sna tshogs nyams dga' ba //
T02TD1432E:224b-25: bsam pa sna tshogs gzung ba'i phyir //
T02TD1432E:224b-26: rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa'i phyir //
T02TD1432E:224b-28: gang zhig de nyid yod gyur na //
T02TD1432E:224b-29: de dag thams cad grol ba'i rgyu //
T02TD1432E:224b-30: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag /
T02TD1432E:224b-31: phyag rgya chen po grub pa /
T02TD1432E:224b-32: dpal dril bu zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1432E:224b-34: // / pande ta pradznya bha dra dang /
T02TD1432E:224b-35: lo ts'a ba mal gyo blo gros grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//
